name: .UAE File Extension
summary: Learn about .UAE files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can load the settings a UAE file contains in WinUAE (Windows). To do so, open WinUAE Properties and select Configurations. Then, select Load From... and navigate to and open your UAE file.
Because UAE files are plain text files, you can also view the settings they contain in Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
